VoiceList.Entry: Cid “Welcome to my airship-the Highwind!”
Cid “What's wrong!? You should be more excited than that!”
Red XIII “Cid…”
Cid “Yeah…”
Tifa “Not enough crew.”
Red XIII “Do you think we aren't strong enough without Cloud?”
“Do you think we can't save the Planet alone?”
Tifa “Meteor is coming, and Weapon is on the rampage…”
“At a time like this, I don't know what I'm supposed to do.”
Tifa “No idea at all…”
Barret “Get a hold of yourself,Tifa! C'mon,let's think about this!”
“No way we can get offa this train we're on!”
Tifa “If only Cloud was here, everything would be fine.”
Tifa “Cloud would…”
“…stand that cocky little way he did,and tell us what to do.”
Tifa “He'd say,'Everything's under control,Tifa.'”
Barret “Tifa! When'd you become such a wimp!”
Tifa “I'm sorry,Barret.”
“I'm so depressed, I'm surprised at myself.”
Red XIII “And Tifa…the reason why we all thought it was Cloud was because…”
Tifa “I know.”
“That's why I want to make sure. That's why I have to see him again.”
Cid “I want you to know I didn't dislike him.”
Cid “I gotta admit he was a strange dude.”
“Just when you thought he was cool, he'd do some damn fool thing.”
“Then when you thought he was smart, he'd show how stupid he was.”
Cid “Everything about him from his movements to his speech were kinda odd.”
“Knowin' what I do now, I can see why he was that way.”
“Well,as long as you stay alive, you just might see him again someday. So cheer up,sis.”
Tifa “…I'll be able to see him someday.”
Cid “If we can find out where he is, the Highwind'll get us there in no time.”
Red XIII “Maybe…”
Red XIII “Cloud is still stuck deep in the North Crater, where the ground cracked and swallowed him up…”
Red XIII “Buried in the depths of the underground…”
Tifa “Deep within the earth…are you talking about the Lifestream?”
Red XIII “The Lifestream sometimes gushes out from cracks in the ocean floor to the surface.”
“I heard about such a place.”
Red XIII “Maybe,just maybe Cloud's…”
Pilot in training (LV3) “Yaaaaahh! Don't talk to me right now!”
“Get a hold of yourself!”
Pilot in training (LV3) “Waaaaah! Captain Cid!”
Cid “Tifa,sorry,but I've gotta show this moron how to land the ship.”
Cid “Don't worry,it'll be done in a minute.”
Cid “Oh,and Tifa…”
“No matter what your goal is, you've got to be prepared.”
“Go to the Operation room and get ready.”
Cid “I put a lot of things for you in the Operation room, so go get ready.”
Cid “OK! You just signal when you're ready to fly full speed.”
Pilot in training (LV4) “Eagggghh! Are we going?” We're going We're staying put
Pilot in training (LV4) “Eagggggh! We're off!”
Cid “Well,it takes all kinds.”
Barret “What're we gonna do now! What can WE do?”
Barret “Huh? Ain't there nothin' we can do?”
“An' don' go tellin' us to wait for Cloud to get better.”
Cait Sith “Oh,I've got some news.”
Barret “Yeah,what!? That you a spy?”
Cait Sith “Yeah… I've already told you I was.”
Cait Sith “Both Gya ha ha and Kya ha ha are up to something.”
“Wanna eavesdrop?”
Barret “Corel!”
Barret “What else can they do to Corel!?”
Red XIII “And the Huge Materia…”
“You mean the Huge Materia,don't you? I've heard about it.”
“When our small Materia nears the larger one, there should be some reaction.”
“I'm certain of it.”
“That's why we're using the Materia power in our fight…”
Barret “Can't let Shinra get a hold of the Huge Materia!”
Barret “Besides,when Cloud gets back, I wanna show him this Huge Materia. He's gonna be shocked.”
Cait Sith “So,what are you saying,Barret?”
“Even though you're always knocking him, you really want Cloud to return.”
Barret “I ain't sayin' nothin' 'bout nothin'. So just…shut your face!”
Barret “Every group's gotta have a leader.”
Barret “An' that's me!”
“Or at least I wanna be… But I ain't cut out to be no leader.”
“I never knew that till lately.”
Barret “That's what it is.”
Cid “…ZZZZ…hmph?”
Cid “Wha? What's goin' on?”
Barret “You been chosen to be the new leader.”
Cid “Pain in the ass. Forget it.”
Barret “But for us to fight, we gotta have Highwind,and you.”
“We need it to save the Planet. An' who's runnin' this ship? You!”
“That's why you're our new leader. Ain't no one else can do it.”
Cid “Hmm…this ship's gonna save the Planet,huh? Ain't that gonna be just a little tough?”
Cid “Oh man,stab me in the heart.”
Cid “I'm a man,too!”
“Okay,I'll do it! Everyone,follow me!”
Barret “Alright,now here's the first job.”
“The Operation Room's waiting for you!”
Cid “Yeah!!”
Barret “As soon as we're ready, we'll head for the Corel reactor.”
“Hurry,Cid!”
Pilot in training (LV5) “Eaggggghh! Congrats' on becoming our leader,Cap'n!”
Pilot in training (LV5) “Yaaah! Are we taking off?” Yes No
Pilot in training (LV5) “Eagggggh! We're taking off now!”
Cid “Hey…”
Cid “It's tough being the leader.”
Cid “Cloud did a great job. Sheesh…”
“Shall we go to Mideel to check on things?”
Red XIII “I wonder how Cloud's doing.”
Red XIII “I wonder if Tifa needs a break…”
Red XIII “I could look after him instead.”
Cid “Well,let's see… What's a good place to head to?”
“Corel? Fort Condor?”
Cid “Where shall we go next? Shall we head for the Corel reactor?”
Cid “What's next? Shall we head for Fort Condor?”
Pilot in training (LV6) “Yaah! Shall we take off?” Yes No
Pilot in training (LV6) “Yaah! We're taking off!”
Barret “What's that sad face for?”
Barret “What? Does Cloud always gotta be around?”
“We did fine without him in the beginning…”
“Right? An' what happened to the tough girl I used to know? Where'd she go to?”
Barret “Whenever I think of Cloud, everything gets all jumbled up.”
“No matter how powerful Shinra or Hojo is, I can't believe they can create humans.”
“But because of them, we know that Meteor is heading towards us.”
“Y'know,even if I saw him, I don't have a damn idea what I'd do.”
Barret “Yo,Leader-man! Get your pilot ass up here!”
Barret “Leader-man? What's next!?”
Barret “Yo,wanna see what Tifa and the gang are doing?”
Red XIII “Cheer up,Tifa…”
Red XIII “There appears to be a small island near the Lifestream……”
“They said the Lifestream sometimes suddenly gushes out at the Southern island.”
“I remember hearing about this from Seto when I was a child, but I don't remember much else…”
“I'm sorry…Tifa.”
Red XIII “We'll do our best for Cloud and you.”
“…And Aeris,too.”
Red XIII “Cid.”
“Let's visit Cloud and Tifa from time to time.”
Red XIII “Say Cid.”
“I wonder how Tifa and Cloud…are doing.”
Cait Sith “Tifa.”
“You saw him slapping Scarlet around?”
“Yeah,he did a good job,too. It felt good just watching.”
“Let's never forget that spirit,and give it our all!”
Cait Sith “Tifa,I'll give you info on Shinra.”
“Ask me if there's anything you don't understand.”
Cait Sith “Everything appears calm right now at Shinra.”
“So now's the time to look for Cloud.”
“I'm worried about him,too.”
“I wonder where Cloud is. Or could he already be…”
Cait Sith “Tifa… Do you think it's a good idea for me to quit Shinra?”
Cait Sith “Oh,I'm sorry.”
“Tifa,there's no way I can quit right now…”
Cait Sith “Cid, I'm expecting big things from you”
Cait Sith “Cid,you're tired,huh?”
“I'd like to change places with you,but I'm in charge of information, so I can't. Sorry.”
Cait Sith “Hmmn,the Huge Materia is at Corel,Fort Condor,and…”
“I'm sure there was another place that had it. Where was that…?”
Cait Sith “Shinra's…stopped.”
“Now we've got to be careful. I know Heidegger and his gang are plotting something.”
Vincent “…So glad you're all right,Tifa.”
Vincent “Too much hope is the opposite of despair.”
“An overpowering love may consume you in the end.”
Vincent “Cid…I wish I had your go-get-them attitude.”
“It appears my feelings vanished into thin air ever since my long slumber….”
Vincent “…Don't expect me to do anything other than fight beside you.”
“I have no words of comfort.”
“Of course,I don't believe you're the type who needs the kindness from others…”
Vincent “You look really tired,maybe you're ready to give up being leader?”
Cid “No use singing the blues,baby. The best thing to do is to keep movin'.”
“Whenever anyone talks to me, I get all nervous and mess things up!”
Cid “Hey you! What the hell are you doin'!?”
“Good day,Captain!”
“All we have to do is just pilot. They don't have to talk to us.”
“Looks like you turned out to be the leader after all,Captain…”
Pilot in Training (LV7) “Yaaah! Shall we take off?” Roger Negative
Pilot in Training (LV7) “Man! We're taking off!”
